Commodity Fetishism

May 17, 2005

Over at Savage Minds I have a post about consumerism and inequality. Here is a taste:

Unfortunately, today’s anthropologists seem to be increasingly fetishizing the commodity. There are lots of reasons for this … However, I worry about this growing emphasis on consumption, especially as such studies can obscure the very nature of social inequality which is about much more than what we can consume.

{anthropology, consumerism, consumption, inequality}
